statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions
SELECT user_id, username, engagement_score FROM user_interactions ORDER BY engagement_score DESC
SELECT post_id, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like'
SELECT username, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE engagement_score > 3.5
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, engagement_score ASC
SELECT user_id, username, post_id, interaction_type, engagement_score FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1001 AND interaction_type IN ('comment', 'share')
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_posts > 5 ORDER BY total_posts DESC
SELECT user_id, username, post_id, engagement_score FROM user_interactions WHERE engagement_score >= 4.5 AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date = (SELECT MAX(interaction_date) FROM user_interactions)
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, platform, interaction_type FROM user_interactions;
SELECT interaction_time, platform, user_id FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, engagement_time FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, engagement_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, platform, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM user_interactions WHERE platform = 'Web' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, platform, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM user_interactions WHERE platform = 'Mobile' AND interaction_type = 'Like';
SELECT user_id, platform, interaction_type, MAX(interaction_time) AS latest_interaction FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.platform, e.engagement_score, e.engagement_time FROM user_interactions u JOIN engagement_metrics e ON u.user_id = e.user_id WHERE u.platform = 'Mobile';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_datetime < '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(engagement_value) AS max_engagement_value FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM advertising_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_datetime FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY user_id ASC, interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT engagement_type, SUM(engagement_value) AS total_engagement FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY engagement_type HAVING total_engagement > 100;
SELECT u.user_id, u.interaction_type, e.engagement_value FROM user_interactions u JOIN engagement_metrics e ON u.user_id = e.user_id WHERE u.interaction_type = 'view' AND e.engagement_value >= 50;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions ui JOIN advertising_campaigns ac ON ui.user_id = ac.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT post_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT platform_name, followers_count FROM SocialPlatforms ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE post_id = 100 AND comments > 10;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE platform_id = 3 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS post_count FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT EngagementMetrics.post_id, likes, shares, platform_name FROM EngagementMetrics JOIN SocialPlatforms ON EngagementMetrics.post_id = SocialPlatforms.platform_id;
SELECT AdvertisingCampaigns.platform_id, AVG(budget) AS avg_budget FROM AdvertisingCampaigns GROUP BY platform_id;
SELECT * FROM AdvertisingCampaigns WHERE end_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM ad_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'click' ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, join_date FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles JOIN user_interactions ON user_profiles.user_id = user_interactions.user_id WHERE user_interactions.engagement_score > 50;
